game.title: The Lost Treasure of Trollmoor
game.objective: Find the treasure guarded by the trolls in Trollmoor Forest.
game.description: You have heard rumors of a great treasure hidden deep in the heart of Trollmoor Forest. However, it is heavily guarded by grumpy and powerful trolls. Your quest will not be an easy one!
game.quest-giver: Grimbeard the Old, at the local pub.

task.objective: Speak to Grimbeard and accept the quest.
task.description: Find Grimbeard at the local pub and accept his quest for finding the treasure in Trollmoor Forest.
task.location: The local pub, in the village

task.objective: Gather information about the trolls and their habits from the elves.
task.description: The elves in Trollmoor Forest are known to have a deep knowledge of the forest's inhabitants. Speak to them and gather valuable information about the trolls and their habits, which may help you in your quest.
task.location: Elf settlement, south-east of the village
